original_title: 近親相姦 ノーパン義母 波多野結衣
overview: One day, when I went to the bathroom, my son Yuji was in it. However, Yuji intentionally does not get out of the bathroom. As a result, Yui leaks pee. When Yuji saw it, he ordered, "From now on, live with no underwear!"
title: Fakecest No-pants Stepmom Yui Hatano
